summary.para: Contains information about whether files in a stream have been modified.

remarks.para: This structure is used if the FSCTL_CSV_CONTROL
control code is called with a enumeration value of CsvControlQueryFileRevision, or if the control code is used with an structure containing that enumeration value.
Revision tracking is per file, not per stream, so the output changes whenever the stream changes.

summary.para: The identifier of an NTFS file.

item.description: FileRevision[0] increases every time the CSV MDS stack is rebuilt and CSVFLT loses its state.
FileRevision[1] increases every time the CSV MDS stack purges the cached revision number for the file.

FileRevision[2] increases every time the CSV MDS observes that file sizes might have changed or the file might have been written to. The element is also incremented whenever one of the nodes performs the first direct input/output operation on a stream that is associated with this file after opening this stream.

summary.para: If any of the numbers are 0, the function caller should assume that the file was modified.
